meanings: Adverb A word imitating the sound made when rice, barley, wheat, etc., is cut.
Adverb A word imitating the sound made when it snows or one steps on snow.

vlive.korean: 마지막에 찍는데 - 사각형 이거? We shot it last. - You mean the square one? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 스키즈 옥상토크♡
vlive.english: We shot it last. - You mean the square one?

vlive.korean: [사각지대] 제로, 제로, 다섯! [Hard to see it from here] Zero, zero, 5! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.11
vlive.english: [Hard to see it from here] Zero, zero, 5!

vlive.korean: [사각지대 이런 곳] 와 진짜 어디다가 놨어요? [Like a hidden corner] Seriously, where is it? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.3 돈't Lie #1 (Don't Lie #1)
vlive.english: [Like a hidden corner] Seriously, where is it?

vlive.korean: 이게 평행사변형 아니고 - 사각형 아니야 그냥? It's not a parallelogram. - Isn't it just a square? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.10 S.B.S #1 (SEVENTEEN BRAIN SURVIVAL #1)
vlive.english: It's not a parallelogram. - Isn't it just a square?

vlive.korean: [자꾸 카메라 피해서 요리조리 숨는 황까미 씨] 사각지대에 딱 가버리냐? [Hwang Ggami is avoiding the camera] How do you know all the blind spots? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [SKZ VLOG] 현진 : 현이, 지독한 짝사랑
vlive.english: [Hwang Ggami is avoiding the camera] How do you know all the blind spots?

examples.korean: a pair of boxer shorts 발음듣기 사각 팬티 한 벌 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a pair of boxer shorts 발음

examples.korean: He has a strong square jaw. 발음듣기 그는 강인해 보이는 사각형 턱을 하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He has a strong square jaw. 발음

examples.korean: He bent the wire into the shape of a square. 발음듣기 그가 전선을 구부려 사각형을 만들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He bent the wire into the shape of a square. 발음

examples.korean: The farm buildings form three sides of a square. 발음듣기 그 농장 건물들은 사각형의 세 변을 이루고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The farm buildings form three sides of a square. 발음

examples.korean: The boat is rounded at the front but squared off at the back. 발음듣기 그 보트는 앞쪽은 둥글지만 뒤쪽은 사각형이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The boat is rounded at the front but squared off at the back. 발음
